title: Contest? O_o

replies.body: We're on the same page right now. Weird.
replies.body_tagged: We're on the same page right now. Weird.

replies.body: ParaSpider made a contest that whoever makes the best map out of all the other maps wins a prize. The prize will most limey be a Emerald rank at the moment. I am too lazy to see when it started and stuff, but that is just an overview of what the contest is. I hope I helped :D
